de.bht.swp.lao.ocp.whiteboard
Class WhiteboardController

java.lang.Object
  de.bht.swp.lao.ocp.whiteboard.WhiteboardController

@Controller
@RequestMapping(value="/whiteboard/*")
public class WhiteboardController
extends java.lang.Object

This class handles whiteboard specific requests.

create

@RequestMapping(value="/list.htm",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String create(@RequestParam(value="name")
                                              java.lang.String name,
                                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
Creates a named whiteboard. If the name is null, the user will be redirected to the login site.

Parameters:
name - Name of the whiteboard.
request - The request.
Returns:
The name of the view to display.

invite

@RequestMapping(value="/inviteuser-{whiteboardId}.htm",
                method=POST)
public void invite(@RequestParam(value="mailData")
                                  java.lang.String mailaddress,
                                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                  @PathVariable(value="whiteboardId")
                                  java.lang.Long whiteboardId,
                                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
            throws java.io.IOException
Invites an user by email address to the whiteboard with whiteboardId. This method sends an email to invited users.

Parameters:
mailData - The mailData.
result - The result.
request - The request.
whiteboardId - The id of the whiteboard.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
